overview: Charming stranger Pai Chen arrives in a small town to settle an old score with nefarious local hoodlum Scarface Wu Hsu, who runs an opium smuggling ring. Hsu is planning a drug deal with another crime boss that Pai decides to thwart. Feisty young lass Hei Lu helps Pai out.
tagline: Violent! Unstoppable! Unbreakable! Uninhibited! Dangerous! Devastating! Wicked! Deadly! Delicious!
title: Deadly China Doll
